author: Simon Difford
description: Take at the first sign of a cold, and then retreat under your bed covers. Repeat dose regularly while symptoms persist. Warning - do not consume with other forms of medication.
name: Cold Comfort
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
